titleStmt.title: An answer to certain printed reasons for knights and burgesses in the County Palatine of Durham.
titleStmt.author: Cosin, John, 1594-1672.

notesStmt.note: Publication date in Wing = [1665?], but related items appear to have been issued in 1660.

A reply to either: Reasons humbly offered why the County Palatine of Durham should send knights and burgesses to Parliament; or, Reasons wherefore knights and burgesses are desired for the County Pallatine of Durham.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
